fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- 1473: The Founder, 1474: The Designer, 1475: The Balancer, and 1476: The Simulator will always spawn. If more than four members would be required to spawn for any reason, the remaining members are replaced by Neutral Evil roles.
- If The Founder dies, all other Creators will become enraged, gaining Basic defense and multitasking.
- Factional chat
- No factional kill until The Founder dies, at which point the Creators gain a Powerful factional kill that doesn't take up their night actions.
- The Creators cannot win until every non-Creator is dead.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Witness the end of the chaos that you have created.
